properties.description: Specific properties for the cloud component

tables.description: Setup the tables that we will create in BigQuery

table_id.description: A unique ID for the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

expiration_time.description: (Optional) The time when this table expires, in milliseconds since the epoch. If not present, the table will persist indefinitely. Expired tables will be deleted and their storage reclaimed.

time_partitioning.description: (Optional) If specified, configures time-based partitioning for this table.

type.description: (Required) The supported types are DAY, HOUR, MONTH, and YEAR, which will generate one partition per day, hour, month, and year, respectively.

field.description: (Optional) The field used to determine how to create a time-based partition. If time-based partitioning is enabled without this value, the table is partitioned based on the load time.

require_partition_filter.description: (Optional) If set to true, queries over this table require a partition filter that can be used for partition elimination to be specified.

expiration_ms.description: (Optional) Number of milliseconds for which to keep the storage for a partition.
